590a358486f77429692b2790 Description: A compact, high-energy lithium battery commonly used in small electronic devices, tactical devices, and military-grade sights. Known for its long shelf life and reliable performance.
5672cb304bdc2dc2088b456a Description: A small, coin-cell lithium battery commonly used in general electronics like watches, and calculators. In military applications, it powers devices such as tactical devices, and military-grade sights, providing reliable, long-lasting energy in a compact form factor.
process-default_battery: {{deviceName}} ({{deviceId}}) has no defined battery, defaulting to CR2032 Battery
process-sicc_container: Added batteries to SICC Container filters
